name: Dr. Mental
description: Dr. Mental. A legendary mental practitioner  that is called upon a special mission. He is summoned at the New Hope Mental Asylum to investigate a strange case. But things get more entangled when he discovers what the institution's agenda is all about and how things are run there. A story based game where you are the decider of events, the story, decisions and ending will be based on your choices. So dive in to the magical world of Dr. Mental and see what powers and gifts he possesses. Support me for more quality content. Thank you and please leave some feedback after your play experience.
